    Let's Talk

    Get Back on the Road.

    Since 2006.

    Advance Fleet Services, a family owned & operated company has been providing world-class service in fleet maintenance, tractor-trailer repair, and customer service. We are happy to announce that we have now opened a new location in Central Birmingham Alabama.

    For over 16 years Advance Trailer Maintenance LLC. has partnered with one of the largest transportation companies in the world and maintains a reputation for being a premier fleet service provider. We have implemented processes, service, and quality to ensure that our customers' fleets run as seamlessly as possible.

    Advance Fleet Services LLC. Excels in: Quality of work, ability to fix a unit from the ground up, tractor repairs, switcher repairs, quick and timely repairs of drive-by’s and service calls, FAI’s, campaigns, safety, training, and ensuring that our customers' operations stay running around the clock.

    With our strong company values, excellent service team, and unparalleled expertise, Advance Fleet Services LLC. is dedicated to keeping your fleet running strong!
